job_description:
Acumatica is a company on a mission. We are a leading innovator in cloud ERP with customers located around the world. But don’t take our word for it—read what analysts like G2 and Info-Tech have to say about us.

Acumatica is a leading provider of cloud business management software that empowers small and mid-size businesses to unlock their potential and drive growth. Built on the world’s best cloud and mobile technology and a unique customer-centric licensing model, Acumatica delivers a suite of fully integrated business management applications, such as Financials, Distribution, CRM, Manufacturing, Commerce and Project Accounting, on a robust and flexible platform. In an interconnected world, Acumatica enables customers to take full control of their businesses, play to their organizations’ unique strengths, and support their clients by following them anywhere on any device.

Acumatica’s culture is casual and high-energy. We are passionate about our product and our mission and we are loyal to each other and our company. We value work/life balance, efficiency, simplicity, freakishly friendly customer service, and making a difference in the world. Acumatica offers exceptional professional and financial growth potential.

As a Senior Software Developer, you will be part of Acumatica team of developers that collaborate and create small and large-scale, production-grade cloud-based ERP, CRM, and other web applications using Microsoft technologies (.NET, C#, MS Sql Server) for businesses around the world.

What you will do:

Work in a team designing and implementing complex Acumatica ERP solutions.
Develop Acumatica ERP customizations using the Acumatica xRP framework and the Acumatica Customization Platform.
Work with developers and analysts, design, develop, and support integrations between Acumatica and other systems.
Research and prototype solutions to complex challenges within and outside of Acumatica ERP modules.
Maintain existing solutions, adapt them to new business requirements, troubleshot and resolve issues, and improve performance.
Analyze the code, Identify and remedy defects in existing solutions.
Work closely with development partners on architecture and implementation of Acumatica ERP solutions.
Provide guidance and support to developers participating in Acumatica’s development network, and evangelize the Acumatica xRP framework.

You:

You have 5+ years of experience in creating business applications using Microsoft technologies (.Net, C# and MS-SQL)
You have strong knowledge of C# and experience in writing, profiling, and optimization of complex queries
You have experience in teamwork with version control systems (preferably Git and Bitbucket).
You have strong knowledge of the principles, patterns, and design of complex software systems, and the ability to apply them in practice.
You’re passionate about writing things that are “elegant and efficient” – things that are robust, scalable, and that perform well.
Your personal software practices ensure you deliver high quality even under pressure.
You have had exposure to complex business solutions (ideally ERP, Financial, Construction, Manufacturing, Supply Chain, E-commerce, CRM, or other business management software).
You have a willingness to work directly with customers to investigate, gather product feedback, and solve problems.
You enjoy collaborating with, learning from, and teaching others (including across disciplines) so we all become better.

This role is available in either Montreal or Ottawa office.

Acumatica is an Affirmative Action and Equal Opportunity Employer/Veterans/Disabled.
